Html:
Just wanted to drop a note to let users know I will be monitoring this area in case someone had questions or would like to discuss the API, KerbalSpace or any topics related to the API or its components. (ie I will happily answer any general Json.Net usage questions).

If you are using the API for a personal project or a project posted to the Kerbal Space community please drop a message in this thread to let me know. I just like to see how the API is being used.

I had some ideas regarding an external program that would run a campaign for KSP and was very pleased when I found this!
Just responding to your request for messages regarding use. I would love to hear from you if you are still monitoring this, and I may have a question or two
